name: Filling In PDF Fields With Data Found In a .csv & Saving Copies using PyPDF2 and Pandas
description: If you have one pdf template with fillable fields, here's how to fill them all in and saving each as a copy, with data found in a .csv, all the while keeping the fields dynamic and editable!

name: Installing Keras To Work With GPUs
description: How to install the Python Library Keras and to ensure it runs off your GPU. Includes methods to check and test for which GPU Keras sees available for use
